name: Cubot (itch)
description:
DescriptionAt first sight, Cubot is a puzzle-game with a minimalist gameplay, just move color cubes towards tiles of the same color.It's really ease, but it will be a torture for your mind to complete all levels of the game because the apparent simplicity of the game is in contradiction with the complexity of the level-design.Moreover, an important point in the gameplay is if you have multiple cubes, they move simultaneously !Features
  • Easy gameplay, one finger is enough to move the cube where you want...that's it!
  • Simplistic but not repetitive, several concepts are used to diversify puzzles but also to make them more complex. Like color cubes with different capacities or elements (buttons, elevators, color swappers, teleporters…).
  • The game and menus have a clean look to not disturb your concentration. In the same vein, the music is very soothing.
  • There are 80 levels in the game for several hours of playtime to keep you challenged.
  • The challenge increases level by level. If you are stumped, help is available!
